about_the_game:
You suddenly find yourself in an unfamiliar shopping district.

All you can hear is your footsteps and the ticking of the second hand.

If you notice anything unusual, immediately move left.
If nothing unusual happens, move right.
There is an exit on 10th Street.
Nothing unusual will happen on 0th Street.

Use the hints to help you escape from the shopping district.

[About the features of this game]

・This is a game inspired by The Exit 8 (Like Exit 8)
・You can play with simple operations such as walking and moving your viewpoint.
・Contains mild horror elements
・There is a recurring element

[About circulating elements]

You can continue to enjoy the game even after escaping.

・New abnormalities will begin to appear.
・The situation in the shopping district will change slightly.

[Play time]

First escape: 15-60 minutes
Find all the abnormalities: 60-240 minutes

[Method of operation]

Move: WASD + Mouse Cursor
Run: Shift
Open Menu: ESC
Operate Menu: Left Click

[Strategy Tips]

・Undiscovered anomalies will occur first (except under certain conditions)
・Pay attention to changes in sound as well.

[Recommended options]

【Volume】
The sound of the clock can be heard softly from the start of the game

【Screen】
Full screen or 1920x1080

[About save]

Auto-save will occur at the following times.

・When an abnormality is successfully discovered
・When you successfully escape

[Video distribution guidelines]

■Basics
・Distribution is possible without permission, regardless of whether it is an individual or a corporation.
・Monetization is possible only by using the functions provided by the video distribution site.
・We would appreciate it if you could include the game name in the title of the video or distribution, or include a link to the Steam page in the summary section, etc.
・It is okay if you can find all the abnormalities within the broadcast or video.
■Notes regarding video titles and thumbnails
・Please do not use expressions that remind people of Exit 8 or sequels of similar works.
Examples of OK expressions: "Like Exit 8" "Like Exit 8"
Examples of unacceptable expressions: “◯◯ version of The Exit 8” “Sequel to The Exit 8?” “Using images and characters from Exit 8”

For distributing the video of this game
We are not responsible for any damages.
Additionally, the contents of these guidelines may change without notice.

name: Shotengai 10

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Suddenly, I realized that I was in a Japanese shopping district that I was unfamiliar with. An unusual shopping street where even if you proceed blindly, you will end up returning to the entrance. Let's exit from this shopping street by relying on the hints left behind.
